lines.text: You know, those guys in there think I'm crazy. And I am, too!
Are you the one who catches the screwy squirrels who break out of that joint?
Yep, that's my job, that's what I do, chase screwy squirrels, screwy squirrels, chase 'em, yeah.
Well, you better catch me quick, 'cause I'm nuttier than a fruitcake!
[Meathead chases Screwy into a dark cave; screen goes dark; a loud bang is heard]

[Lights a match]
Sure was a funny gag. Too bad you couldn't see it.

[as Meathead chases Screwy, they pass the end title]
Say, that was the end of the picture.
[They walk back to the end title card]
Yup, that's it all right.
So long, Meathead.
Goodbye.
Say, what was the idea of chasing me all through the picture?
Because you're crazy. You think you're Napoleon, but you ain't. I am!
[Acts crazy]
You know, I like this ending. It's silly.
Say, you lose something, chum?
I'm looking for that screwy squirrel.
Would you recognize him if you saw a picture?
Sure.

[Holds a picture frame in front of him]
Is this him?
Yeah, that's him.
He went that way, just over that fence.
Gee, thanks.
[Meathead jumps over the fence and off a cliff]

[At the bottom of the cliff, holding a newspaper]
Extra! Extra! Read all about it! Dumb dog falls for corny old gag! Extra!
[Meathead lands]
Paper, mister?
[Hands Meathead paper; headline reads "Sucker!"]

[answers phone in middle of chase]
Hello? You don't say. You don't say. You don't say!
[hangs up]
Who was it?
He didn't say.
